Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Westbound Reroute near Grand/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Westbound 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Pulaski, North Avenue, and Grand due to, street blockage near Grand/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Pulaski, North Avenue, and Grand due to, street blockage near Grand/Pulaski.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
